name: GPIB Interface to Mathematica (GITM)
short_description: Making use of the MathLink protocol, GITM allows Mathematica from Wolfram Research to communicate with devices over a GPIB (IEEE 488) bus. Typically GITM would be used to collect data from test instruments and to use the data within Mathematica.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)
